title: We've temporarily disabled Maokai due to a bug...

replies.body:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/originals/cc/8f/26/cc8f268d79fcfb1d245c23895800c5ed.jpg

For you, good sir.
Not what I expected, but amazing. http://i.imgur.com/gZQ57.gif
How wood you know?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gpaOy8b8X6A

you see, everytime he killed Kha'Zix Maokai would begin to evolve
eventually his saplings would deal more damage to isolated targets and he would be invisible during his ultimate
Oh

Rly? {{champion:64}} {{champion:127}} 
(I hate that joke but I must do it)
Damn termites, killing 25% of the current toplane pool
I was going to put this on the boards, literally word for word, but then i was like "nah, no one will appreciate it".  Well I appreciate it
Your appreciation is appreciated.
You appreciating my appreciation is appreciated. Appreciation inception
I can continue. I won't.
I appreciate that.

Frking termites, they always invading MAH trees. 

This is why we need an exterminator {{champion:29}} skin
I'm fairly certain Twitch would be the worst exterminator and is the ROOT of the problem in the first place.
[http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/483/894/463.jpg](http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/483/894/463.jpg)

Puns of damage

Your head.

Note how it ascends into the heavens, far beyond your reach. It's glittering perfection as it stays afloat over your head, but how you cannot see its glory as you refuse to crane your neck ever so slightly to see it. It's not only a shame, but a sin to miss such a marvelous example of pun based humor.

Your idea of puns and joke, as well as your attempt at sophistication, is, plainly put, dismal and drab. It is a joke - if it can even be called one - that is as funny as having to change the diapers of a baby. Thus, I suggest that before you attempt to use bombastic words in a poor attempt to denigrate others, you commit yourself to some deep introspection and realize the low level of your joke.
I want to argue but that's so beautiful. I don't even care enough about the insult just due to the fact THAT SOMEONE ACTUALLY COUNTERED BIG WORDS WITH BIG WORDS! DEATHBYWAFFLE I COMMEND YOU SIR!

Puns of Damage 
-Phreak
I rate tree outta three
how long does it take to fix this, maki is my fav champ and about a week of waiting is so long to play my favorite tree again :(
Thank you for the laugh. plus juan.
He removed his lantern and blended in with the summoners rift. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=64EyTErffVw
